title: Bounding box disappears when manipulating model (rotate/translate/scale)

content.raw:
1. Insert a model

2. Select the model (bounding box is attached to model)

3. Select translate mode (manipulator is attached to model, bb still there)

4. Drag a manipulator handle and release -> the bounding box disappears but the manipulator is still attached.

I find this a bit confusing, specially when there are many models. I think that the bounding box should be showing for as long as the model is selected.
